snippet.title: Curse of the Dead Gods - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Now available: https://www.focus-home.com/games/curse-of-the-dead-gods?utm_source=YouTube&utm_medium=description&utm_campaign=LaunchTrailer#shop
Official website: https://www.focus-home.com/games/curse-of-the-dead-gods?utm_source=YouTube&utm_medium=description&utm_campaign=LaunchTrailer
Twitter: https://twitter.com/PlayDeadGods
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/PlayDeadGods/

Curse of the Dead Gods launches today on PS4, Xbox One, Switch and PC!

After a successful Early Access on Steam, Curse of the Dead Gods, the indie action roguelite from Passtech Games and Focus Home Interactive, launches today on PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, and PC! A year of Early Access brought a massive amount of new content and many additions thanks to the efforts of the fantastic community. Curse of the Dead Gods, its many temples, traps, enemies, and the final confrontation with the God of Death himself, is now ready for all players to dive in. Check out the Launch Trailer today!

Now available on PlayStation 4, Xbox One, and Switch!

Launch day brings with it three new platforms to enjoy Curse of the Dead Gods on. All content from the Early Access plus the brand-new content that includes the final thrilling encounter and many more tweaks and additions is available on every platform. Players have ahead of them hours upon hours of adventuring, several game modes, and hundreds of combinations of items, relics, and curses.

For a limited time, the game is 10% off across all platforms, so now is the perfect point to jump in. To celebrate this release, Curse of the Dead Gods’ original soundtrack is also now available on Steam and the Epic Games Store as a standalone or bundled with the game with an additional discount. 

Curse of the Dead Gods is available now on PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, and PC, with a 10% launch discount. Players can also get the GAME + OST Bundle on Steam and Epic Games Store, with an additional special discount.
